channel.title: Making where you cant pray on a npc

item.title: Making where you cant pray on a npc
item.dc:creator: @jman7 jman7
item.description:
@jman7 wrote:

ok to make it so that it doesnt pray u need to add this

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ## && plr.ProtMelee == true){
} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ## && plr.ProtRange == true){
} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == ## && plr.ProtMage == true){
and u can also add this for entangle

plr.EntangleDelay = ##;
plr.sM(“You have been frozen!”);}

YOU DO NEED TO ADD THIS IN THE CORRECT AREAS ON YOUR PROGRAMMED LINE OF CODE

Read full topic
item.source: Making where you cant pray on a npc

item.title: Making where you cant pray on a npc
item.dc:creator: @combat_evil1 combat evil1
item.description:
@combat_evil1 wrote:

im adding “the Draugen” in my server im making it attack fast, but i want were you cannot pray against him. im using a delta source and this is what i have in npchandler.java

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1279 && plr.ProtMelee == false) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 422; hitDiff = 3 + misc.random(8); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1279 && plr.ProtMelee == true) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 422; hitDiff = 0;

then a little bit down i have this

&& npcs[NPCID].npcType != 1279

Thank you whoever helps

Read full topic
item.source: Making where you cant pray on a npc
